view_cash_flow_button.label: Cash Flow button
view_cash_flow_button.description: Controls whether this group sees the Cash Flow button in the main navbar.

view_settled_button.label: Settled entries button
view_settled_button.description: Controls whether this group sees the Settled entries button in the navbar.

view_report_button.label: Reports button
view_report_button.description: Controls whether this group sees the Reports section in the navbar.

view_credit_modal_button.label: Credit entry button
view_credit_modal_button.description: Allows users in this group to open the Credit entry modal from the sidebar.

view_debit_modal_button.label: Debit entry button
view_debit_modal_button.description: Allows users in this group to open the Debit entry modal from the sidebar.

view_transference_modal_button.label: Transfer entry button
view_transference_modal_button.description: Allows users in this group to open the Transfer entry modal from the sidebar.

view_cash_flow_entries.label: Cash Flow entries list
view_cash_flow_entries.description: Allows viewing the list of Cash Flow entries.

view_settled_entries.label: Settled entries list
view_settled_entries.description: Allows viewing the list of settled entries.

view_banks_table.label: Banks table
view_banks_table.description: Allows viewing the banks balance table.

view_filters.label: Filters panel
view_filters.description: Allows viewing and using the filters panel on Cash Flow pages.

add_cash_flow_entries.label: Add Cash Flow entry
add_cash_flow_entries.description: Allows creating new Cash Flow entries.

change_cash_flow_entries.label: Edit Cash Flow entry
change_cash_flow_entries.description: Allows editing existing Cash Flow entries.

change_settled_entries.label: Edit settled entry
change_settled_entries.description: Allows editing entries that are already settled.

delete_settled_entries.label: Delete settled entry
delete_settled_entries.description: Allows deleting entries that are already settled.

add_transference.label: Add transfer
add_transference.description: Allows registering transfers between bank accounts.

add_user.label: Add user
add_user.description: Allows creating new users for the organization.

delete_user.label: Delete user
delete_user.description: Allows deleting users from the organization.

view_user.label: View users
view_user.description: Allows viewing the list of users and their details.

view_bank.label: View bank accounts
view_bank.description: Allows viewing bank accounts and balances.

view_member.label: View members
view_member.description: Allows viewing the list of members.

view_group.label: View groups
view_group.description: Allows viewing the list of permission groups.

view_ledger_account.label: View ledger accounts
view_ledger_account.description: Allows viewing the chart of accounts.

view_department.label: View departments
view_department.description: Allows viewing the list of departments.

view_project.label: View projects
view_project.description: Allows viewing the list of projects.

view_entity.label: View entities
view_entity.description: Allows viewing the list of entities.
